channel.title: Attack style PI
channel.description: Where do i look for the attack styles? i wanna edit the strings

item.title: Attack style PI
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:554673”][quote author=Strucker link=topic=673598.msg4503917#msg4503917 date=1454889512]
Where do i look for the attack styles? i wanna edit the strings
[/quote]
CombatAssistant.java
Or, in the packets (AttackPlayer packet handles a good amount of the start of combat… same with Mage npc/etc.

You should be more specific as to what “Strings” you want to edit.[/quote] The crush, slash, stab, block, those ones i might have removed combat completely, do you happen to have the file so i can look at it?

Read full topic
